reasoning: Grade II chondrosarcoma is intermediate-grade malignant cartilage tumor. Global chondrosarcoma incidence ~0.3-0.4 per 100k; Grade II represents approximately 40-50% of cases, estimated at 0.15 per 100k. Based on bone tumor registries and epidemiological estimates.
source: Giuffrida AY et al. (2009). Chondrosarcoma: composition, demographics, and outcomes of a North American cohort. J Bone Joint Surg Am. 91(5):1063-1072
